thread.title: Aqeel clinches Federal Cup singles, doubles titles
thread.title_full: Aqeel clinches Federal Cup singles, doubles titles

title: Aqeel clinches Federal Cup singles, doubles titles
text:
- Monday, October 19, 2015 - From Print Edition 
KARACHI: Favourite Aqeel Khan clinched men’s singles title after beating Heera Ashiq in the summit clash of 30th Federal Cup ranking tennis championships 2015 at Syed Dilawar Abbas PTF tennis complex in Islamabad. 

Aqeel won the first set easily by 6-2 and went on to take the second set 6-1 to claim the title in style. 

Aqeel cashed Rs45,000, while Heera pocketed Rs25,000. Aqeel also won the tournament’s doubles event crown with teammate Shahzad Khan. The duo recorded a straight-set 6-2, 6-4 triumph against Muhammad Abid and Usman Rafiq. 

Meanwhile, Waqar Nisar and Asad Niaz claimed Seniors 60 Plus doubles title after beating Pakistan Tennis Federation (PTF) president Salim Saifullah Khan and Mehboob Khan in straight sets 6-1,6-1. 

A total number of 130 players participated from all over the county in seven events. An amount of Rs300,000 was distributed as cash awards among the players.
